Original:
在台灣難得能吃到日本道地的蕎麥麵
特別是「十割」😘
在日本都是吃沾醬汁的乾麵(ざるそば)，今天試試湯麵。
和沾醬汁的最大不同還是在麵的味道不會被醬汁給蓋掉，不會太鹹，也更容易吃出蕎麥麵的香氣。
鴨胸肉肥美，切的也很厚實，口感非常好。
火侯恰到好處，不會硬，軟嫩適中肥美。
溫泉蛋也相當好，跟著麵一起入口，又是另一種吃法，蛋香四溢增加了一份濃郁的口感。
小小遺憾是小菜的黑豆和牛蒡的口味不是我喜歡的🤣
但這純屬個人喜好的問題⋯
EN:
Rarely can eat Japanese authentic buckwheat noodles in Taiwan
Especially "ten cuts" 十
In Japan, I eat dry noodles (ざるそば) with sauce. Try the soup noodles today.
The biggest difference from dipping sauce is that the taste of the noodles will not be covered by the sauce, it will not be too salty, and it is easier to eat the aroma of buckwheat noodles.
The duck breasts are fat, and the cut is thick, and the taste is very good.
The fire is just right, it will not be hard, soft and tender.
The hot spring eggs are also quite good, and it is another way of eating with the noodles. The egg fragrance overflows a strong taste.
Small regret is the taste of the black beans and beefness of the side dish is not my favorite 🤣
But this is a question of personal preference ...

Original:
這家餐廳的老闆是華國飯店的老闆，在餐飲業有多年經驗，對美食、美酒和生活有深入的理解。他對這間店投入了很多心血。與老闆交談後才了解到，他們的食材都是精心挑選的。每一種蕎麥麵都是從不同的產地特別採購而來，確保了菜品的品質和風味。

Dear John 是老闆的一個咖啡品牌，推薦大家試試他們的咖啡啤酒，這種風味獨特的飲品在市面上比較少見。咖啡啤酒融合了咖啡的香氣和啤酒的爽口，味道非常出色，值得一試。

畫面中的清酒冰淇淋也是他們的特色之一，這款冰淇淋選用了高品質的清酒製作而成，風味獨特。老闆對酒類有很深的研究，品味也非常出眾，店內引進了不少優質的酒品，特別適合對紅酒和清酒有興趣的朋友。

總體來說，這家餐廳不僅在食材選擇上用心，還在酒品和飲品的搭配上下了很大功夫。如果你對美食和美酒有高要求，這裡絕對是一個不可錯過的好地方。無論是來這裡品嚐蕎麥麵，還是嘗試獨特的咖啡啤酒和清酒冰淇淋，都會是一個愉快的體驗。
EN:
The owner of this restaurant is the owner of Hua Guo Hotel. He has many years of experience in the catering industry and has a deep understanding of food, wine and life.He invested a lot of effort to this store.I learned with the boss that their ingredients were carefully selected.Each kind of buckwheat noodles are specially purchased from different origin to ensure the quality and flavor of the dishes.

Dear John is a coffee brand of the boss. I recommend everyone to try their coffee beer. This unique drink is rare on the market.Coffee beer blends the aroma of coffee and the refreshing beer. The taste is very good and it is worth trying.

The sake ice cream in the picture is also one of their characteristics. This ice cream is made of high -quality sake, which has a unique flavor.The boss has a deep research on wine, and the taste is also very outstanding. Many high -quality wine products have been introduced in the store, which is especially suitable for friends who are interested in red wine and sake.

Generally speaking, this restaurant not only focuses on the selection of ingredients, but also has a lot of work in the matching of wine and drinks.If you have high requirements for food and wine, it is definitely a good place to miss.Whether you come here to taste buckwheat noodles or try unique coffee beer and sake ice cream, it will be a pleasant experience.

Original: 好喝的飲料。 1隻蚊子在我們周圍嗡嗡作響。我的飲料上有 1 個小蟲。 3 顆星，因為嚴重的錯誤問題。這麼好的咖啡館為什麼不解決飛行動物的問題呢？這超出了我的理解範圍。在現場外掛起藍光之類的東西，在門外設置驅蟲劑之類的。只需擺脫錯誤即可！
EN: Drink drink.A mosquito buzzed around us.There is a little worm on my drink.3 stars, due to serious errors.Why doesn't such a good cafe solve the problem of flying animals?This is beyond my scope of understanding.Set up blue light and other things outside the scene, set up insect repellent outside the door.Just get rid of the error!

Original: 花俏又創新的蕎麥麵店。
EN: Varuated and innovative buckwheat noodle shop.

Original: 優越的地理位置、氛圍和友好的員工。點了熱沙拉、炸魷魚和蕎麥麵。食物肯定很美味！
EN: Outstanding geographical location, atmosphere and friendly employees.Ordered hot salad, fried squid and buckwheat noodles.The food must be delicious!

Original: 很棒的串。除了菜單和飲料的選擇非常有限。現代風格的裝修，這裡是約會的好地方。
